name: Ebola surveyor
tagline: Ionic app to stop Ebola outreach
body:
### Welcome to “Ebola SURVEYOR“ *** Ebola Surveyor is an application to stop Ebola outreach in West Africa developed by jean Pokou for the groupe Ivoirien IVOCARTE ABYSHOP. This application was built using [Ionic](http://ionicframework.com/) the beautiful, open source front-end SDK for developing hybrid mobile apps with HTML5 and google [Angular Js](https://angularjs.org/). ### Google Play
[Ebola Surveyor](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ionicframework.ebolaapp597322&hl=en)
You can fork or copy this repository at will, but I am not pushing any new updates I will remain as it is.
# Installation First Download the project or clone it using git
1. Install Node Js
[Node js](http://nodejs.org/)
2. Install Ionic
Using npm command line tool install ionic
` $npm Install -g cordova ionic`
Then Move to the directory of the project, build android or iOS and start, that’s all
` $ cd your_repo_root/repo_name`
`$ ionic platform add android`
`$ ionic build android`
`$ ionic run android `
If you dont have a connected android device the emulator will start
NB: you need Apache ant and Android development Tools in you environment path if you are on Windows, you can google how to use Cordova. ### Credits Image credits goes to IVOCARTE ABYSHOP. ### Support or Contact Having trouble with using it or any help you want I am here jeanpokou@gmail.com or [@jeanpokou](https://twitter.com/JeanPOKOU)
